pageProps.body:
(CVPR 2023)BundleSDF

相机固定,对刚性物体做追踪重建.也可以用在静态场景重建的SLAM中.

方法

Online Pose Graph Optimization

从内存池(SLAM中叫关键帧队列)取 ∣Ppg∣=K|\mathcal{P}_{pg}|=K∣Ppg​∣=K 帧,与当前帧 Ft\mathcal{F}_tFt​ 构成位姿图 G=(V,E)\mathcal{G}=(\mathcal{V},\mathcal{E})G=(V,E),即 V=Ft∪Ppg\mathcal{V}=\mathcal{F}_t \cup \mathcal{P}_{pg}V=Ft​∪Ppg​.

位姿图损失函数

Lpg=ωsLs(t)+∑i∈V,j∈V,i≠j[ωfLf(i,j)+ωpLp(i,j)]\mathcal{L}_{pg}=\omega_s \mathcal{L}_{s}(t)+\sum_{i \in \mathcal{V},j \in \mathcal{V},i \neq j}[\omega_f \mathcal{L}_{f}(i,j)+\omega_p \mathcal{L}_{p}(i,j)]Lpg​=ωs​Ls​(t)+i∈V,j∈V,i=j∑​[ωf​Lf​(i,j)+ωp​Lp​(i,j)]

ωs,ωf,ωp\omega_s,\omega_f, \omega_pωs​,ωf​,ωp​ 经验性的设置为1.

Lf(i,j)=∑(pm,pn)∈Ci,jρ(∣∣ξi−1pm−ξj−1pn∣∣2)\mathcal{L}_{f}(i,j)=\sum_{(p_m,p_n) \in C_{i,j}} \rho (||\xi_{i}^{-1}p_m-\xi_{j}^{-1}p_n||_2)Lf​(i,j)=(pm​,pn​)∈Ci,j​∑​ρ(∣∣ξi−1​pm​−ξj−1​pn​∣∣2​)

Ci,jC_{i,j}Ci,j​是通过网络检测出来的对应关系.

Lp(i,j)=∑p∈Iiρ(∣ni(p)⋅(Tij−1πDj−1(πj(Tijp))−p)∣)\mathcal{L}_{p}(i,j)=\sum_{p \in I_i} \rho (|n_i(p) \cdot (T_{ij}^{-1} \pi_{D_j}^{-1}(\pi_j(T_{ij}p))-p)|)Lp​(i,j)=p∈Ii​∑​ρ(∣ni​(p)⋅(Tij−1​πDj​−1​(πj​(Tij​p))−p)∣)

F(i)\mathcal{F}^{(i)}F(i) 中的点在 F(j)\mathcal{F}^{(j)}F(j) 中的重投影误差.

Ls(t)=∑p∈Itρ(∣Ω(ξt−1(πD−1(p)))∣)\mathcal{L}_{s}(t)=\sum_{p \in I_t} \rho (|\Omega (\xi_t^{-1}(\pi_D^{-1}(p)))|)Ls​(t)=p∈It​∑​ρ(∣Ω(ξt−1​(πD−1​(p)))∣)

深度图中点的在网络 Ω\OmegaΩ 中查询出来的sdf值为0.

Neural Object Field

几何函数 Ω:x↦s,x∈R3,s∈R\Omega:x \mapsto s,x \in \mathbb{R}^3,s \in \mathbb{R}Ω:x↦s,x∈R3,s∈R

外观函数 Φ:(fΩ(x),n,d)↦c,fΩ(x)∈R3,n∈R3,d∈R3,c∈R+3\Phi:(f_{\Omega(x)},n,d) \mapsto c, f_{\Omega(x)} \in \mathbb{R}^3,n \in \mathbb{R}^3,d \in \mathbb{R}^3,c \in \mathbb{R}_{+}^3Φ:(fΩ(x)​,n,d)↦c,fΩ(x)​∈R3,n∈R3,d∈R3,c∈R+3​

法线 n(x)=∂Ω(x)∂xn(x)=\frac{\partial \Omega(x)}{\partial x}n(x)=∂x∂Ω(x)​

光线ray xi(r)=o(r)+tid(r)x_i(r)=o(r)+t_i d(r)xi​(r)=o(r)+ti​d(r) o(r),d(r)o(r),d(r)o(r),d(r)是光线的原点和方向

外观渲染方程

c(r)=∫z(r)−λz(r)+0.5λω(xi)Φ(fΩ(xi),n(xi),d(xi))dtω(xi)=11+e−αΩ(xi)11+eαΩ(xi)\begin{gather*} c(r)=\int_{z(r)-\lambda}^{z(r)+0.5 \lambda} \omega(x_i) \Phi(f_\Omega(x_i),n(x_i),d(x_i)) \mathrm{d}t \\ \omega(x_i)=\frac{1}{1+e^{-\alpha \Omega(x_i)}}\frac{1}{1+e^{\alpha \Omega(x_i)}} \end{gather*}c(r)=∫z(r)−λz(r)+0.5λ​ω(xi​)Φ(fΩ​(xi​),n(xi​),d(xi​))dtω(xi​)=1+e−αΩ(xi​)1​1+eαΩ(xi​)1​​

ω(xi)\omega(x_i)ω(xi​) 是钟形概率密度函数. α\alphaα 常数, 用来控制概率分布.

采样策略 在空间占据网格开始边界到 z(r)+0.5λz(r)+0.5 \lambdaz(r)+0.5λ 之间采样 NNN 个点, 再以概率 N(z(r),λ2)\mathcal{N}(z(r),\lambda^2)N(z(r),λ2) 采样 N′N'N′ 个点, 最终采样 N+N′N+N'N+N′ 个点.

Uncertain free space不确定性空间损失,对于边界处的采样光线,给一个小值.

Lu=1∣Xu∣∑x∈Xu(Ω(x)−ϵ)2\mathcal{L}_u=\frac{1}{|\mathcal{X}_u|}\sum_{x \in \mathcal{X}_u}(\Omega(x)-\epsilon)^2Lu​=∣Xu​∣1​x∈Xu​∑​(Ω(x)−ϵ)2

Empty(free) space 自由空间损失

Le=1∣Xe∣∑x∈Xe∣Ω(x)−λ∣\mathcal{L}_e=\frac{1}{|\mathcal{X}_e|}\sum_{x \in \mathcal{X}_e}|\Omega(x)-\lambda|Le​=∣Xe​∣1​x∈Xe​∑​∣Ω(x)−λ∣

Near-surface space 近表面空间损失

Lsurf=1∣Xsurf∣∑x∈Xsurf(Ω(x)+dx−dD)2dx=∣∣x−o(r)∣∣2dD=∣∣π−1(z(r))∣∣2\begin{gather*} \mathcal{L}_{surf}=\frac{1}{|\mathcal{X}_{surf}|}\sum_{x \in \mathcal{X}_{surf}}(\Omega(x)+d_x-d_D)^2 \\ d_x=||x-o(r)||_2 \\ d_D=||\pi^{-1}(z(r))||_2 \end{gather*}Lsurf​=∣Xsurf​∣1​x∈Xsurf​∑​(Ω(x)+dx​−dD​)2dx​=∣∣x−o(r)∣∣2​dD​=∣∣π−1(z(r))∣∣2​​

appearance network supervision 颜色损失

Lc=1∣R∣∑r∈R∣∣Φ(fΩ(x),n(x),d(x))−cˉ(r)∣∣2\mathcal{L}_c=\frac{1}{|\mathcal{R}|} \sum_{r \in \mathcal{R}}||\Phi(f_\Omega(x),n(x),d(x))-\bar{c}(r)||_2Lc​=∣R∣1​r∈R∑​∣∣Φ(fΩ​(x),n(x),d(x))−cˉ(r)∣∣2​

Eikonal regularization Eikonal 正则化,用来保证网络预测的值为sdf

Leik=1∣Xsurface∣∑x∈Xsurface(∣∣∇Ω(x)∣∣2−1)2\mathcal{L}_{eik}=\frac{1}{|\mathcal{X}_{surface}|} \sum_{x \in \mathcal{X}_{surface}}(||\nabla \Omega(x)||_2-1)^2Leik​=∣Xsurface​∣1​x∈Xsurface​∑​(∣∣∇Ω(x)∣∣2​−1)2

训练损失函数

L=Lpg+λuLu+λeLe+λsurfLsurf+λcLc+λeikLeik\mathcal{L}=\mathcal{L}_{pg}+\lambda_u \mathcal{L}_u+\lambda_e \mathcal{L}_e+\lambda_{surf} \mathcal{L}_{surf}+\lambda_c \mathcal{L}_c+\lambda_{eik} \mathcal{L}_{eik}L=Lpg​+λu​Lu​+λe​Le​+λsurf​Lsurf​+λc​Lc​+λeik​Leik​

可训练参数为resolution hash encoder, Ω\OmegaΩ , Φ\PhiΦ , and the object pose updates in the tangent space parametrized in Lie Algebra Δξˉ∈R(∣P−1∣×6)\Delta\bar{\xi} \in \mathbb{R}^{(|\mathcal{P}-1|\times 6)}Δξˉ​∈R(∣P−1∣×6), 第一帧的位姿固定.
